name: ai-retrofit
description: Smart intercom control system with web and mobile apps

scripts.dev:web: npm run build:shared && cd apps/web && npm run dev
scripts.dev:mobile: npm run build:shared && cd apps/mobile && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:mobile
scripts.db:generate-types: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > packages/shared/src/types/database.ts
